pages.text: $(thing)Mafic Alloy/$ is one of the most basic and important resources for creating mechanical devices, used to make many of the various tools and contraptions for automation.$(br2)While it can be crafted by hand early on, it can be made twice as efficiently using a $(l:intro_to_automation/devices#mixer)Mixer/$, only requiring one of each ingredient instead of two.
More information on how to obtain $(thing)Magma/$ can be found $(b)$(l:materials_processing/stone)here/$.
